jd: Hope you are doing good.!!Please let me know if you are interested in the below position.!! Position : Information Technology Project ManagerLocation: Harrisburg, PA Hybrid - will need to be onsite based on needs/requests from teamDuration: Long Term Contract.Visa : NO H1B/CPTInterview mode: : video Job DescriptionPMP certification is requiredRequired Skills:4 year college degree or equivalent technical study7 years of experience directly managing technical initiatives w/large project teams throughout the various IT areas, technical complexity and vendor involvement.7 years of experience with Enterprise solutionsPMP CertificationDuties:Lead the end-to-end implementation of the Electronic Case Management (ECM) system, ensuring alignment with organizational goals and project timelines.Develop subject matter expertise (SME) in case management processes across various departments and apply this knowledge to optimize ECM integration.Collaborate with and guide program-specific project managers, ensuring cohesive strategies and adherence to ECM system requirements.Actively engage in governance meetings and decision-making processes with executive leadership, and stakeholders.Design and execute onboarding plans to transition program offices onto the ECM platform, supporting each phase with clear objectives and timelines.Develop and implement decommissioning plans for legacy systems in alignment with ECM onboarding progress.
